context: CoreWeave pivoted from cryptocurrency mining to GPU cloud computing in 2019. By 2020, the company was building specialized cloud infrastructure for GPU-intensive workloads including rendering and machine learning.

competitors.name: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
competitors.notes: Dominant cloud provider with EC2 GPU instances for ML workloads

competitors.name: Google Cloud Platform
competitors.notes: Cloud provider with TPUs and GPU offerings for AI/ML

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure
competitors.notes: Cloud provider with GPU VMs and AI infrastructure

competitors.name: Lambda Labs
competitors.notes: GPU cloud focused on deep learning workloads

competitors.name: Paperspace
competitors.notes: GPU cloud platform for ML and graphics workloads

competitors.name: Vast.ai
competitors.notes: GPU marketplace for machine learning compute

competitors.name: NVIDIA DGX Cloud
competitors.notes: NVIDIA's own cloud offering for AI workloads
